sentences.english: A skincare mask formulated specifically for people with acne is likely to include benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid.

sentences.english: You should use this facial masque often.

sentences.english: Make a paste with two aspirin and water and use as a facial mask.

sentences.english: Apply the mask to your skin and let it dry for 20 minutes.

sentences.english: Spread contents of sachet on cleansed and slightly wet skin.
